long_description: Cycling reference map is loaded with information including trail facts, general trail descriptions and three indexes to help you find the right ride. Map offers a trail to map index, a city to trail index and a county to trail index. Trail facts include length of trail, general descriptions, surface, biking type, location and trail coordinates (latitudes/longitude). Two sided map features an Illinois state map on one side with maps of Chicago and Rockford areas on other. Full-color measures 25" x 35". Published by American Bike Trails.
short_description: Cycling reference map is loaded with information including trail facts, general trail descriptions and three indexes to help you find the right ride.
